author: Associated Press
title: Inside China’s Smartphone ‘Health Code’ System Ruling Post-Coronavirus Life
description: The system, made possible by the government's embrace of "Big Data," shows green when a user is symptom-free and it’s required in order to do many things in Wuhan.
content:
(WUHAN, China) — Since the coronavirus outbreak, life in China is ruled by a green symbol on a smartphone screen.
Green is the “health code” that says a user is symptom-free and it’s required to board a subway, check into a hotel or just enter Wuhan, the cen… [+4793 chars]
